thread.title: Excellent Location, Good Hotel -
thread.title_full: Excellent Location, Good Hotel - Review of Hotel Madeleine Plaza, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: amk2f
title: Excellent Location, Good Hotel -
text: This is the third hotel in Emeraude chain in which I have stayed. Very good hotel just like the others. Excellent location in one of the best districts of Paris, clean, friendly service. The deluxe room was too small for such a status though, yet it had a killer view of Madeleine square. Had trouble filling my bathtub due, the water kept going through the plug, other than that no issues at all.
